author: Special Correspondent
text:
Forest department personnel seized about 300 kg of sea cucumber, an endangered species protected under Schedule I of the Wildlife Protection Act, 1972, and arrested two persons who were transporting them for a smuggler.

Acting on a tipoff, a special team led by Forest Range Officer S. Ganesalingam intercepted a car at Sayalkudi police check-post on Sunday evening and arrested M. Jafer (59) from Kilakarai and K. Vijay Anand (35) from Bharathi Nagar here.

They were arrested under Sections 9, 39, 50 and 51 of the Wildlife Protection Act. They were produced in the Magistrate court in Mudukulathur on Monday and remanded in judicial custody, Mr. Ganesalingam said.

He said that the accused were transporting the processed sea cucumbers from Tuticorin to hand them over to a smuggler at the bus stand here.

The two could not identify the smuggler as they were told to wait at the bus stand for “someone” to come and receive the contraband.
title: 300 kg sea cucumbers seized
